claim: As of April 15 , 2020 , there were under 70,000 coronavirus cases and fewer than 1,600 fatalities in Turkey .
gold_evidence_text: On 15 April 2020 , the Ministry of Health confirmed that the total number of cases increased to 69,392 and that the death toll reached 1,518 .
label: SUPPORTS

claim: Seven Samurai scored 100 % based on more than 58 reviews .
gold_evidence_text: On the review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes , the film holds a perfect approval rating of 100 % based on 58 reviews , with an average rating of 9.3/10 .
label: REFUTES

claim: Coolaid was released after Snoop Dogg 's 13th studio album .
gold_evidence_text: His 13th studio album , Bush , was released in May 2015 and marked a return of the Snoop Dogg name .
label: NEI
